item.description:
Distance: 7 miles

Duration: up to 3 hours

Difficulty: Moderate

We will be combining the Carolina North and South  loops to make this a 7 mile figure eight. The scenery on this hike will change from gravel wood lanes to open fields. The terrain is relatively flat which would normally give this hike an "easy" rating but at 7 miles I gave it a moderate. This area will provide a nice low stress hike.

There is limited parking in this area which will keep the attendance allowed to a low level. We will  be meeting at the lot for the hunter checking station.

Please be prepared with extra water for hydration as well as hiking boots. Please read and understand the Rhode Island Hiking Club's liability waiver and understand that this is a condition of your participation for this hike.

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Carolina North and South
